statements: SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT id, topic, speaker_name FROM public_hearings;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT speaker_name, topic, location FROM public_hearings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, topic, speaker_name FROM public_hearings WHERE topic LIKE '%environment%'
SELECT id, topic, speaker_name FROM public_hearings WHERE meeting_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY speaker_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_public_hearings FROM public_hearings;
SELECT DISTINCT topic FROM public_hearings;
SELECT speaker_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM public_hearings GROUP BY speaker_name HAVING occurrences > 1 ORDER BY occurrences DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_type = 'Environmental' ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT hearing_topic, hearing_date, location, hearing_type FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT hearing_topic, location FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date < '2021-06-30' AND hearing_type = 'Public';
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_type = 'Community' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_type = 'Public' ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT hearing_id, hearing_topic, location FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND hearing_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_topic LIKE '%environment%' ORDER BY hearing_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_type = 'Community' ORDER BY location, meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, topic FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE role = 'Speaker' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, organizer, topic, date FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM public_hearings;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT topic, date FROM town_hall_meetings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM public_hearings;
SELECT organizer, COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM town_hall_meetings JOIN attendees ON town_hall_meetings.id = attendees.event_id GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT id, name, event_id FROM attendees WHERE role = 'Participant';
SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT hearing_id, hearing_date, location FROM public_hearings WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, organization FROM meeting_participants ORDER BY organization ASC;
SELECT hearing_id, start_time, end_time FROM meeting_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM feedback_comments WHERE hearing_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meeting_participants WHERE organization = 'Company A';
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM meeting_participants WHERE hearing_id = 3 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT comment_text FROM feedback_comments WHERE hearing_id = 2 AND participant_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM meeting_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM hearings;
SELECT hearing_title, start_date, end_date FROM hearings;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT comment_text, hearing_id FROM comments WHERE hearing_id = 1;
SELECT topic_name FROM topics WHERE agenda_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hearings WHERE hearing_id = 1;
SELECT hearing_title, location, start_date FROM hearings ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, role, organization FROM participants WHERE role = 'Lawyer' ORDER BY participant_name;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE participant_id = 3 AND hearing_id = 2;
SELECT hearings.hearing_title, agendas.agenda_title, topics.topic_name FROM hearings JOIN agendas ON hearings.hearing_id = agendas.hearing_id JOIN topics ON agendas.agenda_id = topics.agenda_id;
